Concept: measure the ability of the firm to generate earnings
high level of profitability doesn't indicate there is no issue in liquidity as the accrual basis is applied by the accountant

Key: Net profit margin or rate of return on sales

Concept: this ratio compute the net profit achieved by each pound of net sales
measures the ability of the firm to generate net sales through the active use of assests in different operations of the firm
measures the net profit achieved by each pound of Total assets
this ratio is also called return on investment (ROI)

Key: rate of return on total equity
Concept: measure the ability of owner's equity to generate net profit

Key: Rate of return on total equity
Concept: measures the ability of owner's equity to generate net profit
